column4: I'm trying to install ubuntu 11.04 on my relatively fast, new laptop, but when I boot it from the CD (which the iso is correct), it freezes in the part where the white and orange dots below "ubuntu" move around. Any ideas?
how long did you/are you wait/waiting?
I'm in the same situation. You have to shrink your C: drive after you have used a program called "perfect disk 2k" in Windows
